summary: Lutes are stupid. Get a real guitar.
descriptionHtml:
[center] [b] introduction [/b]
MurdermiesteR making the world a more metal place. I will make Skyrim metal. Blacker than the blackest black times infinity. Seriously though, lutes are dumb. Ditch the lutes and grab a real guitar. Should work with any mod that adds lute playing, even bears.Â 
I actually found it wasn't compatible with [url=http://casualmods.net/BearMusician/BearEng.html] Bear Musician [/url] and made it have built in compatibility along with replaced the terrible music with death metal.
My buddy Goat is the drummer of Devangelist. He gave me permission.

This mod replaces the lute that bards play with a rediculously detailed B.C. Rich Warlock NJ with speedloaders and the whole jazz. Lutes laying around are still lutes. If you want a Warlock to toss around or kill with I made another [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51883/?] mod [/url] for that.

[b] credits [/b]
Bethesda
3DS Max 2012
NifSkope
gimp
Nightasy
Nexus and forums
Devangelist
MurdermiesteR (me) [/center]
author: MurdermiesteR

files.name: Lutes are stupid
files.changelogHtml: Added crazy awesome compatibility with Bear Musician
